    new Player()
    Player.js, line 23

    Properties:
    Name Type Description
    account Account
    experience number current experience this level
    password string
    prompt string default prompt string
    socket net.Socket
    questTracker QuestTracker
    extraPrompts Map.<string, function()> Extra prompts to render after the default prompt
    questData Object

    Methods

    addPrompt(id, renderer, removeOnRendernullable)
    Player.js, line 140

    Add a line of text to be displayed immediately after the prompt when the prompt is displayed
    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Default Description
    id string Unique prompt id
    renderer function Function to call to render the prompt string
    removeOnRender boolean <nullable>
    		 false When true prompt will remove itself once rendered otherwise prompt will continue to be rendered until removed.

    Move the player to the given room, emitting events appropriately

    Name Type Description

    setMeta(key, value)
    Player.js, line 59

    Set a metadata value. Does _not_ autovivify, you will need to create the parent objects if they don't exist
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    key string Key to set. Supports dot notation e.g., `"foo.bar"`
    value * Value must be JSON.stringify-able
